message.name: ERR_WORK_ALLOCATION_TASK_STATUS_CLOSED
message.locale: A task with a status of closed cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_WORK_ALLOCATION_TASK_NOT_ASSIGNED
message.locale: You must either reserve the task or assign it to another user, job, position, work queue or organization unit.
You must either reserve the task or assign it to another user, job, position, work queue or organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_WORK_ALLOCATION_TARGET_XRV_TARGET_ITEMS_STILL_EXIST
message.locale: You cannot delete this allocation target while target items still exist for it.

message.name: ERR_WORK_ALLOCATION_TARGET_XRV_TASK_DEFINITION_STILL_EXIST
message.locale: You cannot delete this allocation target while task definitions are still assigned to it.

message.name: ERR_WORK_ALLOCATION_TASK_FV_DUEDATE_IN_PAST
message.locale: If the task has a deadline it must be sometime in the future.

message.name: ERR_WORK_ALLOCATION_TASK_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New tasks cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_ALLOCATION_TARGET_BOM_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The allocation target with the identifier "%1s" does not exist.
